mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info (user_id,user_pwd,user_name, user_phone, user_email,user_address1, user_role, user_grade, user_insertdate, user_totalm) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_pwd},#{user_name}, #{user_phone},#{user_email},#{user_address1}, 0,'0', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_info ORDER BY user_insertdate
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET user_name=#{user_name}, user_pwd=#{user_pwd}, user_email=#{user_email}, user_phone=#{user_phone}, user_address1=#{user_address1} WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_name product_name, r.review_content review_content, r.review_date review_date FROM reviews_board r LEFT JOIN product p ON r.product_number=p.product_number WHERE r.review_writer = #{user_id}

SELECT o.order_detail_number order_detail_number, o.product_name product_name, o.order_detail_status order_detail_status, o.order_date order_date FROM user_info u LEFT JOIN order_detail o ON u.user_id=o.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id}
